interactivity.requirements: 15 Ayane Lust 15 Kirin Lust You must have seen or permanently missed the following Events: Seen " Prisoner " from Ayane Amamiya
interactivity.to_get_this_event: See Prisoner and have 15+ Ayane and Kirin Lust before starting the event chain. Autoplays after " Chaperone " . This event belongs to an event chain started from " Operation: Firestarter " .
interactivity.to_miss_this_event: Miss seeing Prisoner or have less than 15 Ayane or Kirin Lust before Operation: Firestarter . Replaced by The World is Bad! .

progression.synopsis: As Sensei begins to wind down for the night, he suddenly hears a knock on his door. Opening it, both Ayane and Kirin step in, ready to compete in a bonus competition.
trivia: If this event is missed, the events Made Out of Nothing and Furlough (Tell the World) will automatically become missed.

changelog: This Event was added in Update .17.
